item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a Ph.D. student in a CIFRE fellowship program between Huawei Paris Research Center, University Gustave Eiffel and the French National Institute for Geographic and Forest Information. I received my master’s degree from University Sorbonne Paris Nord, France and bachelor’s degree from Ho Chi Minh University of Technology, Vietnam. My research interests lie primarily in the areas of 3D scene understanding.

item.title: List 100 things I want to do before I die
item.description:
I will try to update this list regularly. Progress: 15/65

  1. ✔️ Start a blog post

  2. ✔️ Live in another country

  3. ❌ Pass JLPT N1 (my 3th language) 💮

  4. ❌ Carry a conversation in French (my 4th language)

  5. ✔️ Work in world’s largest campus (Station F)

  6. ✔️ Work in world’s top big-tech company

  7. ✔️ Become the first author of a paper at a top-tier conference

  8. ✔️ Author a patent

  9. ❌ Get a PhD (in CS) 🎓

  10. ❌ Try another degree (maybe psychology)

  11. ❌ Teach a course

  12. ❌ Have a keynote talk

  13. ✔️ Go to a classical music performance 🎻

  14. ✔️ Go to my favorite artist’s concert (Ado) 💙

  15. ❌ Go to an opera 🎭

  16. ❌ Go to Comiket 🔞

  17. ❌ Learn archery 🏹

  18. ✔️ Go on a camping trip in the mountains 🏕

  19. ❌ Sleep outside on the beach, under the sky

  20. ❌ Take a hot spring bath ♨️

  21. ❌ Participate in a traditional tea ceremony 🍵

  22. ✔️ Play at a casino 🎰

  23. ❌ Watch a bullfight 🐮

  24. ❌ See auroras 🌌

  25. ❌ Ski ⛄️

  26. ❌ Scuba dive 🤿

  27. ❌ Fly a plane ✈️

  28. ❌ Take a hot air balloon ride

  29. ❌ Ride a horse 🐴

  30. ❌ Be in a submarine

  31. ❌ See a meteor shower ☄️

  32. ❌ Eat at 3-star Michelin restaurant

  33. ✔️ Have a Parisian breakfast 🥐

  34. ❌ Eat sushi in Japan 🍣

  35. ✔️ Eat pizza in Italy 🍕

  36. ✔️ Drink beer in Germany 🍻

  37. ❌ See a Broadway show in New York

  38. ❌ Ride a gondola in Venice

  39. ❌ Drink vodka in Russia

  40. ❌ Sail around the Caribbean ⛵️

  41. ❌ Carnival in Brazil

  42. ❌ Go on an African safari

  43. ❌ Surf in Haiwaii

  44. ❌ See morning glory cloud ☁️

  45. ❌ Go on a trip overseas with my whole family

  46. ❌ Visit 10 countries

  47. ❌ Visit 50 countries 🧳

  48. ❌ Visit 100 countries 🌏

  49. ❌ Learn to play chess ♟

  50. ❌ Get a driving lisence 🚗

  51. ✔️ Read 100 books (lol is this real?)

  52. ❌ Read 500 books 📖

  53. ❌ Read 1000 books 📚

  54. ❌ Play a music instrument 🎸

  55. ❌ Play the 2nd music instrument 🎹

  56. ❌ Write a song 🎵

  57. ❌ Have 10 videos on Youtube 🎬

  58. ✔️ Fall in love

  59. ❌ Get married to someone I love ❤️

  60. ❌ Build a home

  61. ❌ Have a cat 🐱

  62. ❌ Have a salad from my own garden 🥗

  63. ❌ Make a dessert 🧁

  64. ❌ Open a bakery 🍞

  65. ❌ Volunteer at a shrine/temple ⛩

We’re just living this moment.
On this path that we’ve chosen.
We’re like diamonds in starlight.
We shine in the dark night.
Cause we are the highlight.
